pageContext.claim: “I won Montana by so many points I don’t have to come here. You know, a lot of people from states where we have these crazy big leads, we had 42 and 44 — we won by 44 points over a Democrat, over a Democrat. We won by 44 points over a Democrat. Now it was Crooked Hillary, but still she’s a Democrat.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump defeated Hillary Clinton in Montana by 20 points, not 42 or 44.
